Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer contacts us because his order has not yet been shipped.

Is there a reason for this?

If not, please ship the order within 24 hours, or we will have to initiate a refund.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation

Regards,
Tania from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We're getting ready to ship the parcel and want to ensure everything's perfect. Can we quickly re-confirm the customer's address?

Your satisfaction is our priority, and this small step helps us guarantee a seamless delivery experience. Just a moment of your time could prevent any delivery issues.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
SY

Dear Backcare,

We have shipped out the device to the customer.

Here is the tracking number: 1ZBF1560D901158075

Please note that as the courier has just picked up the parcel, it might take a while before it is accurately displayed on their website.

In the meantime please do not refund.

If you initiate a refund while the product is being shipped, we will lodge a case with SSC.

Regards,
HB

Dear Backcare,

According to the tracking link, the parcel has been delivered to the customer on 3rd June. Has the customer received the device? Kindly close the case if the customer confirms reception of the device. Thank you.

Regards,
